snippet: New York City Opera declared a rehearsal lockout, and the unions said this could mean that the season will be canceled.
abstract: New York City Opera declares a lockout for the first rehearsal of the 2012 season, after talks break down during labor dispute between the company and its unions; impasse raises the possibility that the company may have to cancel its first production and possibly the whole season.
lead_paragraph: New York City Opera declared a rehearsal lockout, and the unions said this could mean that the season will be canceled.

headline.seo: New York City Opera Declares Rehearsal Lockout
headline.main: Talks Break Down at City Opera
headline.print_headline: Talks Break Down at City Opera
